1. Kapil Dev's Daughter Amiya To Debut As Assistant Director In Ranveer Singh's 83
23-year-old Amiya will be making her debut in the film as an assistant director. Reports hint that Kapil Dev has been actively involved in assisting and helping the entire cast and crew of the film to nail the nuances of the 1983 World Cup right.
2. Mika Singh Extends Help To Actor-Turned-Security Guard Savi Sadhu, Offers A Role In Bipasha Basu Starrer
In his upcoming production titled Aadat, which stars Karan Singh Grover and Bipasha Basu in lead roles, he has offered him a role. Not only that, he has asked him to quit his job as security guard and instead join his team.
The pictures from this special reunion are all over the internet and it'd make you scream for a sequel to their hit film. Have a look at the pictures right here!
Don't Miss 185 SHARES 174 SHARES 544 SHARES
4. After His Cancer Treatment, Irrfan Khan Will Start Shooting For ‘English Medium’ Soon
Looks like Irrfan Khan is recovering and looks like now he is hail and hearty. About a week ago, he was spotted outside producer Dinesh Vijan's office. This paved way for rumours that Irrfan Khan is gearing up for the sequel of Hindi Medium. Now, the new reports suggest that the sequel of the blockbuster movie is titled English Medium.
5. Nick Jonas-PC Holidaying With Family In Miami Will Give Your Major 'Hum Saath Saath Hai' Feels!
If the song 'Sucker' by Jonas brothers wasn't enough to give you full family feels then they are here to surprise you again. After the mega success of their song, the Jonas family is on a family vacation and celebrating it full desi style. Well, apart from enjoying on a cruise along the Miami coast on a Monday, Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas were also seen dancing to a Hollywood-Bollywood playlist. No, we are not kidding!
title: Kapil Dev's Daughter Turns Assistant Director, Mika Offers Role To Savi Sadhu & More From Ent
description: From Kapil Dev’s daughter Amiya making her directorial debut with Ranveer Singh starrer 83 to Mika Singh offering a role to actor-turned-security guard Savi Sadhu in his production starring Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover, here is all that rocked the world of entertainment.
